snippet.title: 🅱️IKMIN 269 REVEAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
Bikmin 269 is a full game mod of Pikmin 2 with a brand new story, and all new areas! Yes, every area is new and fully modeled! This isn't just a "repaint" of Pikmin 2, it contains a new story with characters from a parallel Pikmin universe where many things are strange, covered in memes, or just not correct. With over 60 new treasures to collect and brand new mechanics to make the game feel fresh, this mod is essentially a new game. Its recommended that you don't treat it entirely as a Pikmin game however, this mod is not meant to be taken seriously in most aspects, but its gameplay is meant to be fresh for fans of the Pikmin series to enjoy even if they don't care about the memes.

For more information you can download the mod when it releases and read the included "README.txt".

If you have any questions, or concerns then please join this discord server and ask for help!
Link: https://discord.gg/q9kWEe7TBd

Also, maybe follow my twitter for more random Pikmin content if you're into that kind of thing https://twitter.com/Umiblo

Here is the download link for the mod, it can primarily be played on Dolphin, additional installation instructions are included in the README.txt!
Download Link found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nMcSHx_HiiQ
